description:
Instance spawn operation fails on ESXi compute node in state 'building' as an attempt to configure vifs to the instance fails.
1) virt driver of vmwarepi still uses calls to db instead of calling network api in nova network.
2) vif plug mechanism is faulty, it uses plug method from VMWareVlanBridgeDriver even though the networking model chosen is flat networking. 
3) While spawning an instance IP injection for multiple vifs fails.
title: Instance spawn operation fails on ESXi compute node
